abstract: A profile for the output file type.
overview:
## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which indicates that the writer chooses an appropriate default profile for the output file type. If your app requires segment data that’s suitable for streaming, set the value to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileTypeProfile/mpeg4AppleHLS] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileTypeProfile/mpeg4CMAFCompliant] to output CMAF-compliant [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileType/mp4] data.

You can’t change this value after writing starts.

# outputFileTypeProfile

**Instance Property**

A profile for the output file type.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputFileTypeProfile: AVFileTypeProfile? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which indicates that the writer chooses an appropriate default profile for the output file type. If your app requires segment data that’s suitable for streaming, set the value to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileTypeProfile/mpeg4AppleHLS] or [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileTypeProfile/mpeg4CMAFCompliant] to output CMAF-compliant [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVFileType/mp4] data.

You can’t change this value after writing starts.

## Configuring segment writing

- **delegate**: A delegate object that responds to asset-writing events.
- **AVAssetWriterDelegate**: A delegate protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to asset-writing events.
- **preferredOutputSegmentInterval**: The interval of output segments that you prefer.
- **initialSegmentStartTime**: The start time of the initial segment.
- **flushSegment()**: Closes the current segment and outputs it to a delegate method.
